projects.name: StudyAP
projects.tagline: AI-powered AP and standardized test prep platform for 1K+ students
projects.description: Built an AI-driven study platform generating practice questions, adaptive resources, and analytics for AP and SAT students. Led technical and product development while scaling to over a thousand users through community partnerships and data-driven iteration.
highlights: Developed a question-generation engine using OpenAI and custom fine-tuned models
Integrated progress analytics and topic-level mastery tracking for 10+ subjects
Designed an intuitive student dashboard and admin panel for content management
Scaled backend architecture to support 10K+ question interactions per day
Featured in multiple school and student-led publications for educational innovation
awards: Top 3 Finalist – Global Youth Entrepreneurship Challenge (DE:CODE), 2024

projects.name: LightAid
projects.tagline: Nonprofit tackling global inequalities through light, education, and care
projects.description: Leads technology and operations at LightAid, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit addressing light poverty, period poverty, and educational inequality across developing regions. Built systems for logistics, volunteer coordination, and donation tracking.
highlights: Scaled international network to 750+ volunteers across 10+ countries
Developed automation tools reducing manual reporting by 70%
Tracked and deployed 17K+ donations reaching communities in China, Chile, and Mexico
Built donor and impact analytics dashboards for transparency and reporting

projects.name: FRC Team 3256 WarriorBorgs
projects.tagline: Software systems for competitive robotics automation and analytics
projects.description: Leads the software subteam of FRC Team 3256, developing autonomous, vision, and control systems for competition robots. Built real-time scouting tools and autonomous routines powering award-winning performance at regional and world events.
highlights: Built path-planning and auto-alignment systems using vision and PID control
Developed scouting data pipelines for real-time match analytics
Led a team of 5 software members to deploy modular, fault-tolerant robot code
Created web-based dashboards for robot diagnostics and data visualization
awards: Creativity Award – Rockwell Automation, World Championship (2025)
Regional Engineering Inspiration Awards – San Francisco & Ventura (2025, 2024)
Excellence in Engineering & Innovation in Control Awards (2025)

projects.name: DECA Automation Tools
projects.tagline: Event scheduler, tabulator, and matcher for 200+ DECA members
projects.description: Built a suite of automation systems for Valley Christian DECA to streamline chapter operations and competition logistics. Tools include an event scheduler, Python score tabulator, and C++ roommate matcher used across multiple conferences.
highlights: Automated scheduling for 200+ members across 40+ events with zero conflicts
Reduced manual scheduling time from 20 hours to 2 minutes
Created tabulator used for VCMC and SCDC competition data
Built robust matching algorithm to pair members for conferences efficiently

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.tagline: Minimal interactive portfolio built with Next.js 15
projects.description: Built a modern, CLI-style portfolio emphasizing performance and accessibility. Features command history, tab autocomplete, and smooth animations while maintaining a lightweight footprint.
highlights: 95+ Lighthouse scores across all metrics
Custom CLI parser and routing logic
Keyboard-first UX and responsive design
Hidden Easter eggs and minimal aesthetic
